about_the_game:
Euphionia: The Tree Spirit's Curse is an old school grid-based dungeon crawler, with combo oriented non-turn-based combat. Your objective is to collect the 6 orbs and escape from the maze.

Featuring:

  • Grid-based maze.

  • An interactive combat system.

  • Demo Room

  • Random Battle Encounters.

  • An Experience and Leveling System.

  • Items.

  • "Save anywhere" (outside of battle!)

  • Pixel Art.

  • A mix of 3D environments and 2D gameplay.

...Skolorie has been cursed and is set to wander the Fenmia Mushroom Forest for the rest of time! Can she defeat the odds and find a way out?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel Core i3-1115G4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
